description:
run.bash: add $testverbose to 'go test std'
        To help catch the rare bug on Linux/ARM builder.
        See http://build.golang.org/log/fd6b9890c5c647d222a862f7e8c29d7cd6b136f1
        for the bug.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

On 2012/03/06 22:20:52, rsc wrote:
> Can you try reproducing the failure by hand on the builder?
> This may give you a little more information but then there
> will still be more to gather.
OK, I will run the test in a loop to see what I can get.

Can you try reproducing the failure by hand on the builder?
This may give you a little more information but then there
will still be more to gather.

Russ

subject: code review 5754053: run.bash: add $testverbose to 'go test std'
